name: Automaton Alliance
description:
A 2 player co-op shooter game.

Manual

The goal of the game is to reach the highest level you can. To do this, you will need to find and walk through the door on each level.

But beware, there are enemies which will try to stop you. Avoid getting hit by their projectiles. Health is shared between the two players, so if you get hurt, your friend will get hurt as well! Each enemy you kill will increase the speed of you and your partner until the next level.

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

Left Mouse Button to shoot. You can headshot enemies for extra damage.

Dash - Q  Dash in the direction you are looking. You are invincible while dashing. Dashing through an unmarked enemy will cause that enemy to become marked, and give you a brief window to use your dash again. Killing a marked enemy will heal you slightly and give ammo to your ally.

Dodge - E   Dodge in the direction you are moving. You are invincible while dodging. Dodging through enemy projectiles will lower the cooldown of your dash. You can also dodge into enemies to knock them into each other.

Other tips

  • If you're low on ammo, stand near your teammate to reload
  • Killing marked enemies will get you more speed than normal
  • Knocking enemies into each other will also net you extra speed
  • You can knock your teammate into enemies
